languages.text: "Я не ожидал, что ты сможешь добраться вовремя — в конце концов, бунт застал весь экипаж врасплох в разных концах судна... послушай, и все же — твои раны..."
"I did not expect you would make it here in time — after all, the mutiny caught the entire crew off guard as they were scattered all over the ship... I must say, your wounds..."
languages.original_text: "Я не ожидал, что ты сможешь добраться вовремя — в конце концов, бунт застал весь экипаж врасплох в разных концах судна... послушай, и все же — твои раны..."

traits.locale_text: "I did not expect you to convene with us at the right time — after all, the mutiny caught the entire crew off guard as they were scattered all over the ship... I must say, your wounds..."
"I did not expect you to convene with us at the right time — after all, the mutiny caught the entire crew off guard as they were scattered all over the ship... I must say, your wounds..."
"I did not expect you would make it here in time — after all, the mutiny caught the entire crew off guard as they were scattered all over the ship... I must say, your wounds..."
"I did not expect you would make it here in time — after all, the mutiny caught the entire crew off guard as they were scattered all over the ship... I must say, your wounds..."
"I did not expect you would make it here in time — after all, the mutiny caught the entire crew off guard as they were scattered all over the ship... I must say, your wounds..."

languages.text: “我没想到你居然会及时赶来。毕竟，这场叛乱让所有船员都措手不及，大家被冲散到了这艘船的各个区域……我不得不说，你的伤势……”
languages.original_text: "I did not expect you would make it here in time — after all, the mutiny caught the entire crew off guard as they were scattered all over the ship... I must say, your wounds..."

traits.locale_text: “我没想到你居然会及时赶来。毕竟，这场叛乱让所有船员都措手不及，大家被冲散到了这艘船的各个区域……我不得不说，你的伤势……”

languages.text: «No esperaba que llegara a tiempo; después de todo, el motín ha sorprendido a toda la tripulación justo cuando estaba desperdigada por toda la nave... Disculpe, esas heridas...».
languages.original_text: "I did not expect you would make it here in time — after all, the mutiny caught the entire crew off guard as they were scattered all over the ship... I must say, your wounds..."

traits.locale_text: «No esperaba que llegara a tiempo; después de todo, el motín ha sorprendido a toda la tripulación justo cuando estaba desperdigada por toda la nave... Disculpe, esas heridas...».

languages.text: 「あなたが時間通りに来るとは思っていなかった。なんせ、不意打ちの反乱でクルーが船中に散らばっていたのだからね。しかし、あなたのその怪我は…」
languages.original_text: "I did not expect you would make it here in time — after all, the mutiny caught the entire crew off guard as they were scattered all over the ship... I must say, your wounds..."

traits.locale_text: 「あなたがここに時間通りにくるとは思っていませんでした。結局のところ、不意打ちの反乱で、クルーは船中に散らばっていたのです…言わなければならないことがあります。あなたの怪我は…」
「あなたが時間通りに来るとは思っていなかった。なんせ、不意打ちの反乱でクルーが船中に散らばっていたのだからね。しかし、あなたのその怪我は…」

languages.text: « Je n'aurais pas cru que vous arriveriez à temps ; la mutinerie a pris l'équipage tout entier par surprise, puisqu'il était éparpillé aux quatre coins du vaisseau... Mais je dois dire que vos blessures... »
languages.original_text: "I did not expect you would make it here in time — after all, the mutiny caught the entire crew off guard as they were scattered all over the ship... I must say, your wounds..."

traits.locale_text: « Je n'aurais pas cru que vous arriveriez à temps ; la mutinerie a pris l'équipage tout entier par surprise, puisqu'il était éparpillé aux quatre coins du vaisseau... Mais je dois dire que vos blessures... »

languages.text: "Ich hatte nicht erwartet, dass Ihr rechtzeitig eintrefft – die Meuterei hat die Crew immerhin unvorbereitet getroffen, und alle waren über das ganze Schiff verstreut ... Ich muss sagen, Eure Wunden ..."
languages.original_text: "I did not expect you would make it here in time — after all, the mutiny caught the entire crew off guard as they were scattered all over the ship... I must say, your wounds..."

traits.locale_text: "Ich hatte nicht erwartet, dass Ihr rechtzeitig eintrefft – die Meuterei hat die Crew immerhin unvorbereitet getroffen, und alle waren über das ganze Schiff verstreut ... Ich muss sagen, Eure Wunden ..."

languages.text: "Buraya vaktinde gelmenizi ummuyordum. Ne de olsa isyan bütün mürettebatı gafil avladı, tam da geminin dört bir yanına dağılmışlarken. Söylemem gerek, yaraların..."
languages.original_text: "I did not expect you would make it here in time — after all, the mutiny caught the entire crew off guard as they were scattered all over the ship... I must say, your wounds..."
